product.short-description:
This deluxe holiday set includes contains full sizes bottles of:

  • Perfect hair Day (PhD) Shampoo (8 oz)
  • Perfect hair Day (PhD) conditioner (8 oz)
  • Perfect hair Day (PhD) 5-in-1 Styling Treatment (4 oz)

The set is a $77 value, available during the 2016 holidays for only for $52. A perfect gift to give to your favorite people (or get for yourself - we won't tell!).
product.long-description: Peace Love Perfect Hair PhD Holiday Kit 2016

product.short-description:
An innovative styler that is applied in the shower and lightly rinsed, leaving behind only what you need to create beautiful air-dried styles. Featuring our Thickening Molecule and lightweight conditioners which deliver:

  • enhanced natural texture
  • body
  • softness
  • shine 

Perfect hair Day (PhD) In-Shower Styler is ideal for straight to slightly wavy hair. It is silicone-free and sulfate-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.

Tip: If you have naturally straight hair, try putting your hair in braids or buns and letting it air dry for best results.
product.long-description: Perfect hair Day (PhD) In-Shower Styler (5 oz)

  • shine 

Perfect hair Day (PhD) In-Shower Styler is ideal for straight to slightly wavy hair. It is silicone-free and sulfate-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.

Tip: If you have naturally straight hair, try putting your hair in braids or buns and letting it air dry for best results.

  • softness
  • shine 

Perfect hair Day (PhD) In-Shower Styler is ideal for straight to slightly wavy hair. It is silicone-free and sulfate-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.

Tip: If you have naturally straight hair, try putting your hair in braids or buns and letting it air dry for best results.
product.long-description: Perfect hair Day (PhD) In-Shower Styler Mini (1 oz)

product.short-description:
An innovative styler that is applied in the shower and lightly rinsed, leaving behind only what you need to create beautiful air-dried styles. Featuring our Thickening Molecule and lightweight conditioners which deliver:

  • enhanced natural texture
  • body
  • softness
  • shine 

Perfect hair Day (PhD) In-Shower Styler is ideal for straight to slightly wavy hair. It is silicone-free and sulfate-free. Safe and formulated for color and chemically treated hair.

Tip: If you have naturally straight hair, try putting your hair in braids or buns and letting it air dry for best results.
product.long-description: Perfect hair Day (PhD) In-Shower Styler sample
